title: Twitter, now X, reinstates Kanye West’s account
description: Twitter, now known as X, has reinstated Kanye West's account after banning it last year for violating the platform's rules.

title: Move fast and beat Musk: The inside story of how Meta built Threads
description: As Elon Musk's Twitter stumbled, Mark Zuckerberg pushed for a new app to rival it. The result, Threads, has reinvigorated the struggling social media giant.
